medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient experienced a 24-hour history of isolated high-grade fever beginning on June 18, 2007. By June 22, the fever persisted and diarrhea appeared. The initial treatment for symptoms was followed by ciprofloxacin after gastroenteritis was suspected.
medical_history.social_history: The patient had dissected a dead Amazon parrot from a public park without wearing a mask in early June 2007, which is relevant to the diagnosis of C. psittaci infection.
